titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: William Lewicki (1935-2001) was a chemist and science historian and a descendant of Justus von Liebig, a German chemist who made major contributions to agricultural and biological chemistry.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of journals, photocopies of newspaper articles, a bibliography of works by Justus von Liebig, a press information packet from Bayer AG, announcements of symposia, a catalog from the Zucker Museum, and several miscellaneous catalogs and calendars. Most items are in German, with one in French, one in Czech, and one in English.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
